Description: Fragment of dark green, weft-faced plain weave wool cloth; Warp: S spun, c.9tpc; Weft: S spun, c.25tpc; Edges: ragged
Curator's comments: Unreg. 58; Found in 1988 in a packet in Keeper's Office, previous location cupboard O; Probably clothing; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (9.4.1991)
